import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/Main.css' function Main() { const [isTitleCardOpen, setIsTitleCardOpen] = useState(false) const [isMenuCardOpen, setIsMenuCardOpen] = useState(false) const [isInfoCardOpen, setIsInfoCardOpen] = useState(false) const toggleCard = (cardName) => { setIsTitleCardOpen(false); setIsMenuCardOpen(false); setIsInfoCardOpen(false); switch (cardName) { case title: setIsTitleCardOpen(true); break; case menu: setIsMenuCardOpen(true); break; case info: setIsInfoCardOpen(true); break; } } return (

) } export default Main
